document_data.title: The Howling Void
document_data.editor: [[Claire Hoffman]], [[Chris Tulach]], [[Travis Woodall]]{{Cite adventurers league/The Howling Void|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Howling Void''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Elemental Evil|Elemental Evil]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 5{{th}}- to 10{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''A storm of unparalleled fury has been ravaging the peaks of the [[Earthspur Mountains]] for a [[tenday]], and the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]] sits in its eye for now. Some monks have fled the monastery to the safety of [[Mulmaster]] and beseech you to convince their more obstinate brothers to retreat to the city before the eye of the storm shifts, and the monastary is in terrible danger. Can you brave the elements and convince the monks to escape?''|}}

Locations.Buildings & Structures: [[House of Suffering]] • [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]]
